job.title: Solutions Architect - Remote
job.description: stronguWho We ArebrbrustrongNacelle was built for technologyforward merchants drawn to the benefits of a headless architecture but dissatisfied with the costs and complexity associated with adoption Leaders at FTDcom Boll amp Branch and Thinx use Nacelle to eliminate the typical maintenance costs and infrastructure complexities related to going headless while accelerating their timetomarket Unlike traditional commerce solutions our product is built on eventdriven and elastic core technology optimized for flexibility performance and customizationbrbrNacelle is an early stage venturebacked fully remote company Recently closing our Series A round for 18m our institutional investors include Index Ventures Inovia and more We also have raised from notable industry angels including leaders from Shopify Plus Attentive and KlaviyobrbrstronguThe RolebrbrustrongWe are seeking an experienced strongSolutions Architect strongto be part of a team that is responsible for overseeing the success of our customers technical deployments The SA will work directly with customers and agency partners to deploy Nacelle This person must be a selfstarter and used to a fastpaced energetic environment They are comfortable dealing with ambiguity Ultimately this person should be passionate about solving the customers business problems and the technical challenges that accompany thembrbrThis role will report directly to the Director of Solutions Architecture and will work closely with Sales Customer Success and Product teamsbrbrstronguResponsibilities IncludebrustrongulliBe a technical expert in all aspects of NacelleliliManage activities that take place during solution ideation solution design and solution implementationliliFacilitate discovery sessions to design fullfeatured Progressive Web Applications PWAs for Nacelles customersliliFacilitate eCommerce technology stack assessments and provide recommendations to improve systems and business workflow processes including prototype developmentliliWork handson with customers to demonstrate headless architecture best practices including ensuring knowledge transfer so customers are properly enabled and are able to extend the capabilities of Nacelle on their ownliliWork with customer inhouse development teams and system integrators at a deep technical level to successfully position and deploy Nacelle in customer environmentsliliMaintain a deep understanding of competitive and complementary technologies and vendors and how to position Nacelle in relation to themliliProvide guidance on content and data modelingliliProvide analysis of performance and best practice code audits throughout the implementationliliProvide guidance on how to resolve customerspecific technical challenges during implementation and deploymentbrliulstronguSkills amp Qualificationsbrustrongulli58 years of experience working with enterprise customers in presales or postsales technical role at a SaaS companyliliExperience delivering digital projects that extensively use Graph QL or RESTful APIsliliHands on experience working on projects that utilize microservicesbased architectureliliEfficient communication skills written verbal and presentationliliDevelopment experience with frontend languages like HTML CSS and Javascript React and VueliliExperience with backend technologies and languages like PHP Python Nodejs Redis MySQLPostgreSQL Amazon Web Services AWS liliProven experience in engineering and software architecture designliliWorking experience with data modeling andor content modelingliliPrevious project or product management experienceliliAbility to influence and manage a room this role requires work with a variety of stakeholdersbrliulstronguNice To
